title: Guduchi Ayurveda - Pure Natural Ayurvedic Brand - Skin, Hair Care
description: Ayurvedic Products: Buy Best products skin, hair care personal wellness by Guduchi Ayurveda. Guduchi Ayurveda offers Authentic Ayurvedic Products and scientifically formulated products that help in managing energy, weight, pain, gut health, and stress. Shop online with the best prices.
cleaned_text: The Ayurvedism has been founded with an objective to deliver the finest quality Ayurveda products (Medicines and Cosmetics), build trust about the effectiveness and safety of Ayurvedic medicines, and encourage the usage of more natural medicines that are native to our body. METABOLIC ENHANCER: Obesidat acts as a metabolic enhancer thus helps in burning fats and lipids in the body. INHIBITS LIPASE: Obesidat inhibits pancreatic and gastric lipase to decrease gastrointestinal absorption of fats CHOLESTEROL: Decreases the cholesterol and triglyceride levels. FATTY LIVER: Prevents the formation of fatty liver. HEART HEALTH: Prevents the heart health risks by removing the fat from inner walls of arteries* These products are not recommended for pregnant and lactating women's. * Results may vary from person to person
